name: Meta Communication Therapy: Nee Kiite!
overview: Yuyu is a healing character that constantly moves with Mokomoko with non-stop animation. While communicating with Yuyu, it heals the player's own heart. Consult with Yuyu about a romantic relationship, have a psychological test, and talk with Yuyu on the basis of information obtained from a friend through communication. In addition, it is a new dimension communication tool that combines your hobbies and benefits.
